page.title: 19TRADE IN KNIGHTON
page.content: Knighton is the centre of an agricultural community with a sheep and cattle market.Sheep and cattle are sold on Thursdays and sometimes there are special markets on Fridays.Before sheep are sold they are weighed and graded by the official Grader so that the subsidies can be worked out. The auctioneer then sells pens of sheep, He accepts bids and sells to the highest bidder.The breeds of sheep sold are Clun Forest,Kerrys,and Suffolks . The auctioneer in Knighton is McCartneys and they also have furniture and house sales.Knighton Market is the main market for Wales and the West Country.Its headage through-put is second only to Banbury in England and it is the largest stock market in Wales.
